dialogue: Hi there !! Welcome to this Interactive Game ! My name is Akynna and I'm the creator of this game.
I'm super glad to have you here. How do you feel ?
This is wonderful. I hope you're not too afraid of what will happens next.
Oh, don't leave yet, the fun hasn't began yet !
I know, I know. You will understand a bit more later.
(What does she means ? Now I'm afraid !!)
In this game you are going to meet lots of singular people. Some of them are nice, some others are more difficult to handle, but I hope you will be able to understand all of them !
So? Are we ready to start ?
bad_answer: No, no, I don't want to talk to people...
neutral_answer: Huh, guess I have no choice.

good_answer: Hi, I'm here to help you.
bad_answer: I can ask you the same.
